channel.title: Tried to add Looting
channel.description:
Okay, I followed a PI tutorial on how to add looting imps to my rsps. Yes I'm sure its a PI rsps. Anyway, I followed it just like it said but I get 1 error which bugs me cause I have really no idea how to fix a period. Take a look at the picture below to see what I'm talking about. Also here is the tutorial I followed.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,509227.0.html
EDIT: I get 21 other errors too on my client.java compiler.
client.java:7936: error: illegal start of expression public int DragonImpRare() { ^ client.java:7936: error: ';' expected public int DragonImpRare() { ^ client.java:7940: error: illegal start of expression public int DragonImpCommon() { ^ client.java:7940: error: ';' expected public int DragonImpCommon() { ^ client.java:7944: error: illegal start of expression public int DragonImpBones() { ^ client.java:7944: error: ';' expected public int DragonImpBones() { ^ client.java:7948: error: illegal start of expression public void Lootimpjar(int itemId, int playerId) { ^ client.java:7948: error: illegal start of expression public void Lootimpjar(int itemId, int playerId) { ^ client.java:7948: error: ';' expected public void Lootimpjar(int itemId, int playerId) { ^ client.java:7948: error: expected public void Lootimpjar(int itemId, int playerId) { ^ client.java:7948: error: not a statement public void Lootimpjar(int itemId, int playerId) { ^ client.java:7948: error: ';' expected public void Lootimpjar(int itemId, int playerId) { ^ client.java:7962: error: ';' expected getItems().addItem(DragonImpBones(), 1); calls on the r andomizer to pick an item id ^ client.java:7962: error: ';' expected getItems().addItem(DragonImpBones(), 1); calls on the r andomizer to pick an item id ^ client.java:7962: error: ';' expected getItems().addItem(DragonImpBones(), 1); calls on the r andomizer to pick an item id ^ client.java:7962: error: ';' expected getItems().addItem(DragonImpBones(), 1); calls on the r andomizer to pick an item id ^ client.java:7963: error: ';' expected c.getItems().deleteItem(11256, 1); deletes the imp jar f rom the players inventory ^ client.java:7963: error: ';' expected c.getItems().deleteItem(11256, 1); deletes the imp jar f rom the players inventory ^ client.java:7963: error: ';' expected c.getItems().deleteItem(11256, 1); deletes the imp jar f rom the players inventory ^ client.java:7963: error: ';' expected c.getItems().deleteItem(11256, 1); deletes the imp jar f rom the players inventory ^ client.java:7963: error: ';' expected c.getItems().deleteItem(11256, 1); deletes the imp jar f rom the players inventory ^ 21 errors Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Tried to add Looting
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

From what I’m seeing, you added the methods (client.java in the quote) in a bad spot. and the error in your image is because of naming or imports.

Read full topic

item.title: Tried to add Looting
item.dc:creator: @Rexxy Rexxy
item.description:
@Rexxy wrote:

Okay, I followed a PI tutorial on how to add looting imps to my rsps. Yes I’m sure its a PI rsps. Anyway, I followed it just like it said but I get 1 error which bugs me cause I have really no idea how to fix a period. Take a look at the picture below to see what I’m talking about.
